name: ubc-clf8
description: Common Look and Feel framework for UBC
author: UBC Communications & Marketing

scripts.dbi: cross-env NODE_ENV=development postcss src/css/dbi.css -o build/css/dbi.css && cross-env NODE_ENV=production postcss src/css/dbi.css -o dist/css/dbi.css
scripts.dark: cross-env NODE_ENV=development postcss src/css/dark.mode.css -o build/css/dark.mode.css && cross-env NODE_ENV=production postcss src/css/dark.mode.css -o dist/css/dark.mode.css
scripts.development: cross-env NODE_ENV=development postcss src/css/styles.css -o build/css/styles-all.css && twig-cli "src/html/*.html.twig" --base src/html/ --output build/ && babel src/html/js --out-file build/js/ubc.all.js --ignore "src/html/js/libs/*" --source-maps
scripts.production: cross-env NODE_ENV=production postcss src/css/styles.css -o dist/css/styles-all.css && cross-env NODE_ENV=production postcss src/css/dbi.css -o dist/css/dbi.css && twig-cli "src/html/*.html.twig" --base src/html/ --output dist/ && babel src/html/js --out-file dist/js/ubc.all.js --ignore "src/html/js/libs/*" --presets minify
